original: NILSSON, Hjalmar Fredrik Oscar, Bokhandlare, Kalmar, f Boston USA 3/12 93 av lantbr A N o Ida Svensson, gm Dagmar Pettersson. Anst AB Hånells Bokhdl Hässleholm 09, AB P M Sahlströms bokhdl Linkp 15, AB Hedéns bokhdl Hälsingborg 16, Hjalmar Ap-peltoffts bokhdl Kmr sed. 19, ag o vkst dir dna sed. 37. Suppl Skyttefrb :s överstyr vkst utsk, sekr Kmr l södra Skyttefrb, ordf Möre södra skyttekrets. Kmr l S skyttefrbs ftjGM, Kmr skyttegilles ftjGM, riksskytteGM, högre årt.m g, mästarm g, ett 20-tal mäst.skapsGM.
translated: NILSSON, Hjalmar Fredrik Oscar, Bookseller, Kalmar, born in Boston USA on March 12, 1893, son of farmer A N and Ida Svensson. Married to Dagmar Pettersson. Employed at AB Hånells Bokhdl Hässleholm in 1909, AB P M Sahlström's bokhdl Linköping in 1915, AB Hedéns bokhdl Helsingborg in 1916, and Hjalmar Ap-peltoffts bokhdl Kalmar since 1919. Director of agriculture and development at DNA since 1937. Officer of the Suppl Skyttefrb oversight development committee, secretary of the South Kalmar Skyttefrb, chairman of the Möre södra skyttekrets. Deputy General Manager of the South Kalmar Skyttefrb Championship, Deputy General Manager of the Kalmar Shooting Guild, national shooting champion, multiple championship winner, over 20 championship titles.

career.workplace: AB P M Sahlström's bokhdl Linköping
